author: Paul Rankin
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Cut a cross into the top of each fig and squeeze the bottom slightly to open it out. Place in a gratin dish, drizzle over the honey, butter and thyme and bake for 6-7 minutes.   Remove from the oven and place on top of the griddled brioche on a serving plate. Pour over the warm vanilla custard and serve immediately.
ingredients: 2 fresh figs,  2 tbsp clear honey,  30g/1oz butter, cubed,  2 sprigs fresh thyme,  2 slices brioche, griddled,  ready-made vanilla custard, warmed, to serve
